summary: Adds both Sunder and Wraithguard to Skyrim with there original enchantments from Morrowind, plus a overhaul Keening - Modder Resource
descriptionHtml:
These models were originally meant to be in a much larger quest mod that revolve around restoring the tools back to there former glory like in Morrowind, however it was never release. Anyway I found the models lying around in my files on my old laptop and decided that it would be best to release these to the public. Esp file is already made with script made to make the tools function as they did in Morrowind, plus a modded Keening as well, to acquired them just simply type "help sunder" or "help wraithguard' in console command and type player.additem <itemID> <#>.

If using the .esp file DRAGONBORN DLC is required for wraithguard reflect arrow script to function or else your game will crash.
============================
           INSTALLATION
============================
Install the ESP and BSA to your Data folder.

No known compatibility issues unless using a mod that modify Keening.

============================
        UNINSTALLATION
============================
Remove the ESP and BSA from your data folder.

============================          
               CREDIT
============================
Full credit goes to PrivateEye for Sunder and urbanshiv92/PrivateEye for Wraithguard.

============================           
           PERMISSIONS 
============================
Permission is not given to redistribute this mod in whole or in part on another website. Modders are free to include the resource files directly in there mods. However you must credit PrivateEye as the author of these assets in your mod.
author: TitansBane
